de.is24.grails.tools
[Groovy] Class KarmaTestType

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.support.GrailsTestTypeSupport
      de.is24.grails.tools.KarmaTestType

class KarmaTestType
extends org.codehaus.groovy.grails.test.support.GrailsTestTypeSupport

Karma test type enables the JUnit @RunWith(KarmaTestSuiteRunner.class) annotation when test file ends with 'KarmaSuite'. Integrates the JUnit test runner and grails.
